title.rendered: Student-Athletes Celebrated at Spring Signing Event

content.rendered:
Saratoga Springs High School recently celebrated the accomplishments of the following outstanding student-athletes who have committed to compete at the collegiate level!

  • Angelina Arriaga – Track at Adelphi Unversity
  • Arianna Avila – Softball at Penn State-Behrend
  • Thomas Bundy – Golf at Swarthmore College
  • Caleb Casey – Football at Ithaca College
  • Gianni Delgado – Wrestling at SUNY Cortland
  • Liam D’Evelyn – Lightweight Rowing at Princeton University
  • Samantha Dodds – Rowing at Tufts
  • Shelby Fitch – Rowing at UAlbany
  • Skyler Furtado – Volleyball at SUNY Delhi
  • Macklan Harris – Baseball at Herkimer Community College
  • Evan Katz – Rowing at Trinity College
  • Liam Miller – Soccer at Eastern University
  • Madison Mullan -Volleyball at John Jay College of Criminal Justice
  • Makenna Olszewski – Softball at SUNY Plattsburgh
  • Evan Walsh – Swimming at Clarkson University

In the fall, 19 student-athletes signed National Letters of Intent to compete at the collegiate level. Congratulations to all of our amazing student-athletes!
